meanings.definition: Small insects that feed on wood and can cause damage to buildings.
meanings.sent1: Termites are tiny bugs that eat wood.
meanings.sent2: We need to get rid of the termites in our house.
meanings.sent3: The termites threw a party in the wooden walls.
meanings.sent4: The termites gnawed at the foundation of the house like hungry beasts.
meanings.sent5: The sound of termites munching on the wood was like a tiny orchestra playing.

meanings.definition: A group of termites working together to build a nest.
meanings.sent1: Look at the termites building their nest.
meanings.sent2: The termites are busy constructing their home underground.
meanings.sent3: The termites held a team meeting to discuss nest-building strategies.
meanings.sent4: The termites' teamwork in nest construction was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The sight of termites collaborating to create their nest was fascinating.

meanings.definition: The presence of termites in a home can be a serious problem.
meanings.sent1: Having termites in your house can cause big issues.
meanings.sent2: We discovered termites in the attic, and it's a concern.
meanings.sent3: The termites decided to redecorate the living room without permission.
meanings.sent4: The termites' invasion in the house was like an unwelcome guest.
meanings.sent5: The damage caused by termites was a nightmare for the homeowners.
